Package org.mcm.sws.util

Provides various utitlity classes

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CollUtils Utilities for Collections.
Config The WSPlan configuration class.
Files Utilities for File/Stream handling.
MathUtils Utilities for calculations.
NSDigester A subclass of the Apache Commons Digester that stores the namespace declarations it discovers in a Map.
OntologyParser Utilities for parsing ontologies.
PlannerData Uitlity class for the config class which holds data representing information about the AI planners available to the system.
PrologUtil  
SOAPSender A class for sending SOAP messages.
StrUtils Utility functions for working with Strings
Timer  
XMLUtils Utility functions for working with XML trees, XML QName strings, etc.
 

Package org.mcm.sws.util Description

Provides various utitlity classes
